function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Coupling of dynamics across regions in the population-based estimate","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread between regions","Mitigation":"Implement spatially targeted interventions and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, contact tracing apps","People":"Population in interconnected regions","Owner":"Health authorities, local governments"},{"Description":"Use of prior knowledge to force variables in the population to be constant","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of disease prevalence and dynamics","Mitigation":"Regularly update and validate prior knowledge, incorporate real-time data","Technologies":"Machine learning models, real-time data analytics","People":"Data analysts, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Correction of errors in initial conditions over time","Impact":"Potential underestimation of disease prevalence and delayed response to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Regularly validate and update initial conditions, monitor real-time disease prevalence","Technologies":"Real-time data analytics, predictive modeling","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Health agencies, research institutions"}]}
